document_title: Module-Lattice-Based Key-Encapsulation Mechanism Standard (ML-KEM)
short_description: Specifies ML-KEM (Kyber) with three parameter sets (512, 768, 1024) for quantum-resistant key establishment. Errata Oct 2024.
applicable_industries: Generic IT; Finance; Telecom; Government; Healthcare; Critical Infrastructure
ProtocolOrToolImpact: TLS 1.3, QUIC, SSH, IPsec/IKE, CMS key wrapping

document_title: Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Standard (ML-DSA)
short_description: Specifies ML-DSA (Dilithium) signature algorithms with three parameter sets (44, 65, 87). Errata Oct 2024.
applicable_industries: IT; Finance; Telecom; Government; Identity Management
ProtocolOrToolImpact: X.509 certificates, TLS authentication, code signing, document signature

document_title: Stateless Hash-Based Digital Signature Standard (SLH-DSA)
short_description: Specifies SLH-DSA (SPHINCS+) stateless hash-based signatures with 12 parameter sets.
applicable_industries: Firmware; Critical Infrastructure; Software Updates; Long-term Archival
ProtocolOrToolImpact: CMS signatures, software signing, long-term archival signing

document_title: Digital Signature Standard (DSS)
short_description: Specifies RSA, ECDSA, EdDSA. Removes DSA. Errata May 2025.

document_title: Recommendation for Stateful Hash-Based Signature Schemes
short_description: Specifies LMS and XMSS stateful hash-based signature schemes for firmware signing.
applicable_industries: Firmware; Embedded Systems; IoT; Boot Security

document_title: Recommendations for Key-Encapsulation Mechanisms
short_description: Guidance for implementing KEMs securely including hybrid KEMs and FIPS 140 validation requirements.
applicable_industries: IT; Finance; Gov; Cloud; HSM Vendors

document_title: Transition to Post-Quantum Cryptography Standards
short_description: Roadmap for transitioning to PQC. Proposes 2030 deprecation and 2035 disallowment of classical asymmetric crypto.

document_title: Status Report on the Fourth Round of the NIST PQC Standardization Process
short_description: Documents HQC selection as fourth PQC standard providing code-based cryptographic diversity.

document_title: Hamming Quasi-Cyclic (HQC) Algorithm Specification
short_description: Code-based KEM selected March 2025 as backup to ML-KEM. Draft FIPS expected 2026, final 2027.

document_title: Using Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM) Algorithms in CMS
short_description: Defines CMS KEMRecipientInfo structure for PQ KEMs including ML-KEM.
applicable_industries: IT; Email; Web PKI; Secure Messaging

document_title: Use of the HSS/LMS Hash-Based Signature Algorithm in CMS
short_description: Updated HSS/LMS usage in CMS. Obsoletes RFC 8708.

document_title: Use of HSS and XMSS Hash-Based Signature Algorithms in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines OIDs and certificate structures for stateful hash-based signatures in X.509.

document_title: Certificate Management Protocol (CMP) Updates for KEM
short_description: Adds KEM key transport to CMP. Obsoletes RFC 4210.

document_title: Use of SLH-DSA in CMS
short_description: Defines SPHINCS+ (SLH-DSA) usage in Cryptographic Message Syntax.

document_title: LMS Algorithm Identifiers for Alternative Hash Functions
short_description: Extends RFC 8554 with SHA-3 and SHAKE hash function options for LMS.

document_title: Algorithm Identifiers for ML-DSA in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines X.509 OIDs and certificate structures for ML-DSA (Dilithium) signatures.

document_title: Use of ML-DSA in CMS
short_description: Defines ML-DSA (Dilithium) usage in CMS for document and message signing.
applicable_industries: Email; Messaging; JAR signing; Document Signing

document_title: Terminology for Post-Quantum Traditional Hybrid Schemes
short_description: Defines standardized terminology for hybrid PQ/classical cryptographic schemes.

document_title: Using RSA-KEM in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)
short_description: Updated RSA-KEM for CMS enabling hybrid classical+PQC scenarios. Obsoletes RFC 5990.

document_title: Multiple Key Exchanges in IKEv2
short_description: Enables multiple key exchanges in single IKEv2 SA for hybrid PQ+classical.

document_title: Mixing Preshared Keys in IKEv2 for Post-quantum Security
short_description: Adds PPK (Post-quantum Preshared Key) to IKEv2 for quantum resistance.

document_title: HSS/LMS Digital Signature for Use with COSE
short_description: HSS/LMS signatures for CBOR Object Signing for IoT devices.

document_title: Leighton-Micali Hash-Based Signatures (LMS)
short_description: Stateful hash-based signature scheme LMS. Updated by RFC 9858.

document_title: XMSS: eXtended Merkle Signature Scheme
short_description: Specifies XMSS and XMSS-MT stateful hash-based signature schemes.

document_title: ML-KEM Key Agreement for TLS 1.3
short_description: Adds standalone ML-KEM key agreement to TLS 1.3.

document_title: Post-quantum Hybrid ECDHE-MLKEM Key Agreement for TLS 1.3
short_description: Hybrid X25519+ML-KEM-768 for TLS 1.3. Codepoint 0x11EC. Deployed in Chrome 131+, Firefox.

document_title: Hybrid Key Exchange in TLS 1.3
short_description: Framework for hybrid classical + PQ key exchange in TLS 1.3.

document_title: Post-quantum Hybrid Key Exchange with ML-KEM in IKEv2
short_description: Adds ML-KEM to IKEv2 using RFC 9370 multiple key exchange framework.

document_title: Hybrid ML-KEM Key Exchange for SSH
short_description: Adds ML-KEM hybrid key exchange methods to SSH protocol.

document_title: Algorithm Identifiers for ML-KEM in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines X.509 OIDs and structures for ML-KEM public keys in certificates.

document_title: Algorithm Identifiers for ML-DSA in X.509 PKI
short_description: Defines X.509 OIDs and structures for ML-DSA signatures. Being superseded by RFC 9881.

document_title: Composite ML-KEM for Use in X.509 PKI and CMS
short_description: Composite (classical+PQC) KEM combining RSA/ECDH with ML-KEM for X.509 and CMS.

document_title: Composite ML-DSA for Use in X.509 PKI and CMS
short_description: Composite signatures combining RSA/ECDSA/Ed25519 with ML-DSA for hybrid PKI.

document_title: Use of ML-KEM in the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)
short_description: ML-KEM in CMS using KEMRecipientInfo from RFC 9629.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography in OpenPGP
short_description: PQC for OpenPGP: composite ML-KEM+X25519 encryption and ML-DSA+Ed25519 signatures.

document_title: Post-Quantum Cryptography for Engineers
short_description: Practical guidance for engineers implementing PQC algorithms and protocols.

document_title: Quantum-Safe Hybrid Key Exchanges
short_description: Framework for hybrid ECDH + ML-KEM with standard key combiners (concatenation, HKDF).

document_title: Migration Strategies and Recommendations for Quantum-Safe Schemes
short_description: Strategic guidance for transitioning to quantum-safe cryptography.

document_title: Commercial National Security Algorithm Suite 2.0
short_description: US government adoption requirements for ML-KEM-1024, ML-DSA-87, SLH-DSA, LMS/XMSS. Level 5 recommended.

document_title: CNSA 2.0 Frequently Asked Questions
short_description: FAQ document with implementation timelines: 2025-2030 prefer, 2030-2033 exclusive, 2035 complete.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations and Key Lengths
short_description: German federal recommendations including ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA, XMSS, LMS. Version 2025-01.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations for TLS
short_description: TLS-specific PQC recommendations including hybrid key exchange. Version 2025-01.

document_title: Cryptographic Mechanisms: Recommendations for IPsec
short_description: IPsec/IKEv2-specific PQC recommendations. Version 2025-01.

document_title: ANSSI Views on Post-Quantum Cryptography Transition
short_description: French national guidance mandating hybrid approach for products requiring security beyond 2030.

document_title: ANSSI Views on Post-Quantum Cryptography Transition (2023 Follow-up)
short_description: Updated guidance on hybridization requirements and timeline phases through 2030+.

document_title: Recommendation on Coordinated Implementation Roadmap for PQC Transition
short_description: EU-wide coordination framework for member state PQC transitions. Target 2030 for critical systems.

document_title: Migration to Post-Quantum Cryptography (Preliminary Draft)
short_description: Practical guidance for enterprise PQC migration with use cases and reference architectures.
